title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2052.7 - Minority businesses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2052.7 - Minority businesses

State Regulations

It is the corporation's policy to enhance opportunities for
minority business enterprises to serve as outside contractors. Those areas or
types of personal service contracts for which minority business enterprises may
best submit proposals include, but are not limited to, contracts for hotel and
property operations, construction, design, construction management, repair and
cleaning. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
